fields.name: AdministratorLogin
fields.description: Administrator username for the server. Once created it cannot be changed.

fields.name: AdministratorLoginPassword
fields.description: The administrator login password (required for server creation).

fields.name: Administrators
fields.description: The Azure Active Directory administrator of the server. This can only be used at server create time. If used for server update, it will be ignored or it will result in an error. For updates individual APIs will need to be used.

fields.name: FederatedClientId
fields.description: The Client id used for cross tenant CMK scenario

fields.name: FullyQualifiedDomainName
fields.description: The fully qualified domain name of the server.

fields.name: IsIPv6Enabled
fields.description: Whether or not to enable IPv6 support for this server.  Value is optional but if passed in, must be 'Enabled' or 'Disabled'

fields.name: KeyId
fields.description: A CMK URI of the key to use for encryption.

fields.name: PrimaryUserAssignedIdentityId
fields.description: The resource id of a user assigned identity to be used by default.

fields.name: PrivateEndpointConnections
fields.description: List of private endpoint connections on a server

fields.name: PublicNetworkAccess
fields.description: Whether or not public endpoint access is allowed for this server.  Value is optional but if passed in, must be 'Enabled' or 'Disabled' or 'SecuredByPerimeter'

fields.name: RestrictOutboundNetworkAccess
fields.description: Whether or not to restrict outbound network access for this server.  Value is optional but if passed in, must be 'Enabled' or 'Disabled'

fields.name: WorkspaceFeature
fields.description: Whether or not existing server has a workspace created and if it allows connection from workspace
